file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-23-03-04 - PASSENGER-CABIN ESCAPE-HATCH LINING - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PASSENGER-CABIN ESCAPE-HATCH LINING - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the passenger-cabin escape-hatch lining assembly. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY PASSENGER-CABIN ESCAPE-HATCH ALL 25-23-03-000-801-A LINING - REMOVAL PASSENGER-CABIN ESCAPE-HATCH ALL 25-23-03-400-801-A LINING - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-23-03 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-23-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. PASSENGER-CABIN ESCAPE-HATCH LINING - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the passenger-cabin escape-hatch lining assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 52-21-00-000-801-A/400 PASSENGER-CABIN ESCAPE HATCHES - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that the aircraft is safe for maintenance. (2) Remove the passenger-cabin escape hatch ( AMM TASK 52-21-00-000-801-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A CAUTION: YOU MUST PUT THE PASSENGER-CABIN ESCAPE HATCH ON A WORKBENCH, ON A SOFT SURFACE, TO PREVENT DAMAGE TO ITS PAINTED SURFACE. NOTE: Use the same procedure to remove the linings of the RH and LH passenger-cabin escape hatches. (1) Remove the passenger-cabin escape-hatch lining as follows: (a) Remove the lower recess cup (3) with the screws (6) and washers (5). (b) Remove the upper recess cup (7) with the screws (9) and washers (8). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-23-03 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (c) Remove the screws (11) and washers (12) around the lining assembly (2). (d) Remove the lining assembly (2) from the escape hatch assembly (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-23-03 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Passenger-Cabin Escape-Hatch Lining - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONES 812 822 9. SCREW (4) 8. WASHER (4) ESCAPE HATCH (REF.) 7. UPPER RECESS CUP 10. HOLD DET. A 11. SCREW (11) 12. WASHER (11) 6. SCREW (4) 5. WASHER (4) 4. HOLD 3. LOWER RECESS CUP 1. ESCAPE HATCH ASSEMBLY 2. LINING ASSEMBLY DET. A 145AMM250140.MCE B EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-23-03 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-23-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. PASSENGER-CABIN ESCAPE-HATCH LINING - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the passenger-cabin escape-hatch lining assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION PASSENGER-CABIN ESCAPE HATCHES - INSTAL- AMM TASK 52-21-00-400-801-A/400 LATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A CAUTION: YOU MUST PUT THE PASSENGER-CABIN ESCAPE HATCH ON A WORKBENCH, ON A SOFT SURFACE, TO PREVENT DAMAGE TO ITS PAINTED SURFACE. NOTE: Use the same procedure to install the linings of the RH and LH passenger-cabin escape hatches. (1) Install the passenger-cabin escape-hatch lining as follows: (a) Put the lining assembly (2) on the escape hatch assembly (1). (b) Attach the lining assembly (2) with the screws (11) and washers (12). WARNING: MAKE SURE THAT THE UPPER RECESS CUP (7) IS INSTALLED CORRECTLY. THE HOLD (10) OF THE UPPER RECESS CUP (7) MUST BE SET TO THE BOTTOM PART. (c) Attach the upper recess cup (7) with the screws (9) and washers (8). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-23-03 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL WARNING: MAKE SURE THAT THE LOWER RECESS CUP (3) IS INSTALLED CORRECTLY. THE HOLD (4) OF THE LOWER RECESS CUP (3) MUST BE SET TO THE UPPER PART. (d) Attach the lower recess cup (3) with the screws (6) and washers (5). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the passenger-cabin escape hatch ( AMM TASK 52-21-00-400-801-A/400).
